op.title: Unpopular Opinion: Vera Keyes SUCKS
op.body: She sucked in Love Sets Sail just like she sucks in everything else. Why does she keep getting roles? Is she in debt?

replies.body: she keeps getting roles precisely because she's so good at sucking, if you get my meaning
Vera haters can't stand to see a bueatiful young lady secede in the industry
She has very good chemistry with Dean Domino. Watch them on the red carpet together, seriously. It's magical. I'd love for them to be in a movie together

dean domino, the sleazy dickhead with a gambling problem? that dean domino? that's not chemistry, he's probably high on so much med-x that he's hearing colors and she's just dumb enough to think that's charming

Vera Keyes threads are always so bad. Would it kill everyone to be normal? I think she's a fine young woman with a lot of potential, but her agent is terrible. She's not in debt and she doesn't suck anything.
She was underage in that movie.

replies.user: Dean Martin's evil twin Clean Fartin
replies.body: She turned 18 during filming though, are you really going to be the purity police? Get over yourself
I want to clarify that I onl found her effervescently sexy in the scenes where she was 18 but i was reupulsed by the scenes where she was 17
